A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.name: py-dinosaur

Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.

dependent_to.name: py-pint-xarray

dependent_to.description:
Pyomo is a Python-based open-source software package that supports a
diverse set of optimization capabilities for formulating and analyzing
optimization models.
dependent_to.name: py-pyomo

description:
Pint is a Python package to define, operate and manipulate physical
quantities: the product of a numerical value and a unit of measurement.
It allows arithmetic operations between them and conversions from and to
different units.
name: py-pint

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
